English: (His finger went into his mouth.) He didn't know what to do.
(Now we have to take the wits in the hand.) Now we have to be smart.
Hungarian: Észhez kell térni / okosan kell cselekedni.

English: (She took the spoon in a beautiful hand.) She understood the situation and fixed her mistake.
Hungarian: Megértette a helyzetet és kijavította a hibáját.

English: (She was washed from the top of the head to the heel.) She was washed from top to toe.
(Tiina ran with the tongue underneath the belt.) Tiina was in a great hurry.
